title: finished graduate school!
content: wow. a whole year gone, just like that! feeling like i simultaneously learned too much and not enough. excited about my next steps towards a successful career!

title: starting graduate school!
content: while i definitely learned a lot during my time in undergrad, i often still feel like i'm just getting started. looking forward to learning a ton and absolutely just demolishing the next couple semesters.

title: website is finally complete!
content: after wrestling with CSS for many millennia i have finally completed this site! it always looks easy at first glance, but it always turns out to be emotional torture. flex box is my nemesis.

title: musicological analysis using HMMs
content: in association with a UMass professor, i updated an old hidden markov model (HMM) from python2 to python3 and plugged it into Google Colab. its design is based on an _sl_80s paper_el_ where its used for speech prediction, but this model is adapted to analyze chords using the python library _sl_music21_el_. if you want to check it out, _sl_here's a colab link_el_ to it!

title: graduated!!!
content: at last. i have it. my bachelor's of science in computer science. while i feel like my education is just beginning, i look back on my time as an undergrad with a sense of great pride and accomplishment. real proud of myself!!

title: completed web-looper project!
content: team Âµ has completed our project for the CS 326 final, web-looper! in short, it's a very basic in-browser digital audio workstation, as well as a forum where users can post and share their own projects! i mostly contributed to the interface/design of the looper itself, as well as the front-end internals of the Tone.js library. here's the _sl_repo_el_, and here's the _sl_link_el_!

title: started undergrad at umass!
content: i'm writing this retroactively just to add more posts so you can scroll down some more on this side. pay no heed to this message.
